title: Need An ADC
body:
I'm a support main unranked and I'm sick of helping my ADC get ahead for the rest of my team to lose and feed. I've tried learning more carry champs but support is what I'm really good at. I need someone on a smurf account to just get me through bronze and maybe silver so I can play with a reliable team for once.

Add me up: ConnTroller

replies.body: There are not even reliable teams in challenger, you have to actually seek out reliable players from every rank and play flex with them.
So you're asking to be boosted... in the boards... when riot heavily discourages boosting...
